q1.question: How do I book an appointment?
q1.answer: Click on 'Book Appointment' from your dashboard, select a hospital, choose a department, pick your preferred date and time, then confirm your booking.

q2.question: Can I reschedule my appointment?
q2.answer: Yes, you can reschedule up to 4 hours before your appointment time. Go to 'My Appointments' and click 'Reschedule' on the appointment you want to change.

q3.question: Why didn't I receive an SMS confirmation?
q3.answer: Please check that your phone number is correct in your profile. If the issue persists, contact our support team.

q4.question: Is MedlyGo free to use?
q4.answer: Yes, MedlyGo is completely free. You only pay the standard consultation fees at the hospital.
